short_summary: The department needed sound and AV equipment for an event.
description: Would you like a detailed description of the project?
full_summary:
===============

**Audiovisual Services Tender Announcement**
------------------------------------------

### Tender Details

| Attribute | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS4389036126-Doc4392106330 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Solicitation Number | WS4389036126 |
| Publication Date | 2024-01-15 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2024-02-02, 14:00 Eastern Standard Time |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2024-02-15 |
| Expected Contract End Date | On-going (dependent on project duration) |
| Tender Status | Expired |

### Tender Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is soliciting proposals for the provision of audiovisual and information technology services for the Event Technology Supplier - Intergovernmental Negotiating Committee Meeting (INC-4) taking place in Ottawa, Ontario. The services will support a conference event from April 21-30, 2024.idders are required to provide high-quality equipment and technical expertise to ensure seamless event execution.

### Selection Criteria

The tender evaluation will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price, ensuring that the selected contractor offers the best overall value to the government.

### Contract Terms

The contract will commence on the date of award and is expected to be completed on April 30, 2024. However, the actual duration of the contract will depend on the project schedule.

### Contact Information

* Name: Cathleen Almonte, SPAC/PSPC
* Email: [cathleen.almonte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:cathleen.almonte@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not applicable
* Fax: Not applicable
